amendment.description: To set aside funds for the Regional Test Centers for Solar Technologies of the Department of Energy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2963 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2963 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4333; text: CR S4334) To set aside funds for the Regional Test Centers for Solar Technologies of the Department of Energy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2963 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2963 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 2910.
